Articles.Content:
Hi, having a bit of an issue with SSTU with the whole RSS/RO/RP1 mods on 1.6.1

When I launch the game with SSTU installed it appears unable to load the space station assets, I kind of fixed this by deleting them out of the mod (id rather not have to do this but it was a quick fix) the game then managed to load with the remaining parts of the mod still in the game. The parts are all showing up now, however all of the modular tanks are invisible. I also have the issue where whenever I right click on any SSTU part it brings up the menu and I’m unable to do anything else once the menu appears, I can click a few options on the menu, but I can’t close it or even leave the VAB. Currently not at my PC so I’m unable to provide a mod list (I’m assuming it’s something conflicting) but I have seen someone else post a similar problem to this and couldn’t get that to work for me! Just to let you know I’m using the 1.6.1 install of SSTU from Github. Many thanks
